actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income certain interest on deposits in savings institutions.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income up to $500 ($1,000 in the case of a joint return) of interest on deposits in savings institutions under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income certain interest on deposits in savings institutions.
